before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"d8bsr","text":"Wear necessary safety gear before commencing the work","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4go5o","text":"This protocol is based on existing protocols, such as those for resuscitating microbes, freeze-drying, and selective isolation. It merges the parts of the three protocols to create a new protocol for isolating microbes via resuscitation, centrifugation, and selective isolation. The first part involves resuscitating the microbes; the second part subjects the medium to centrifugation (concentration of the microbes); the third and final part involves the selective growth in a selective broth and subsequent growth on selective agar.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"57s9s","text":"No animals are harmed/used in this experimental setup","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"5fjao","text":"Laboratory protocols must be followed, and the environment must be kept as sterile as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
image_attribution: {"blocks":[{"key":"4o1q8","text":"Image Attribution:\nThe flowchart represents the process of bacterial isolation and cultivation from a food sample for laboratory analysis. The steps involved include resuscitation, centrifugation, and selective isolation. The first part involves resuscitating the microbes; the second part subjects the medium to centrifugation (concentration of the microbes); the third and final part involves the selective growth in a selective broth and subsequent growth on selective agar.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aceuq","text":"To the resuscitation broth media (e.g., peptone water, tryptic soy broth, Luria-Bertani broth, etc.), add the sample, making a 10% solution, i.e.,  in .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":146,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":150,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7rm74","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"90","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3heo4","text":"Mix cell pellets with the desired selective medium broth. Suspend cells thoroughly by using a vortex mix  until complete cell resuspension is achieved aseptically.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":104,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"618m8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"100","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rl28","text":"Then, incubate at the desired temperature , which can be extended up to .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":604800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ieqe","text":"From the above selective broth, subculture onto a selective agar for the desired organism.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"979ga","text":"incubate the selective agar plate at the required temperature for 24–48 hours. then observe for the desired growth and colony morphologies","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"26f1l","text":"The grown broth culture is then centrifuged ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"5000","duration":1800,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1t5dh","text":"Then, concentrate the cell suspension and decant the culture supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"24sll","text":"Store the isolate for further tests (Biochemical, Molecular, etc.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
